About

I’m an engineer, teacher, communicator and maker — rarely in that order. I currently spend a large amount of my time in the Department of Aerospace Engineering at the University of Bristol.

Things I do

Lots of stuff! I think it’s called a ‘portfolio career’ by the cool kids. I quite like it. For the list of stuff I’ve done and do, check out my LinkedIn profile.

I also have a people page at the University of Bristol, and have been known to post on Twitter occasionally as @bullox.

Site

This site is built using the fantastic Jekyll and Jekyll Bootstrap, hosted on GitHub Pages and uses a theme based on Hyde with adaptations shamelessly respectfully copied from Nate Finch.

A load of Bullocks

There are other Steve Bullocks in the world, in case I’m not the Steve Bullock you’re looking for:

  • Steve Bullock, Mayor of Lewisham
  • Steve Bullock, Governor of Montana
  • Steve Bullock, interim President of American Red Cross, and Principal of The Bullock Group LLC
  • Steve Bullock, the attractive one

Please let me know if you are a Steve Bullock who should be on this list.
